About the application:
Nmon Performance Monitor for Splunk is provided in Open Source, you are totally free to use it for personal or professional use without any limitation,
and you are free to modify sources or participate in the development if you wish.
I personally develop Nmon Performance Monitor on my own private time, it is a big work in development, maintenance, support and documentation effort, but i definitively love it.
Off course, if you or your company enjoys my work, if it saves you time and money i will be very pleased in accepting any donation to help me and encourage me to continue this work :-)
